fields.name: House Number
fields.hint: Please enter the house or site number

fields.name: Interviewer
fields.hint: Name of the person conducting the interview

fields.name: Interviewee
fields.hint: Name of the person being interviewed.

fields.name: Household Head
fields.hint: Are you the head of the household?

fields.name: Relationship
fields.hint: What is your relationship to the head of the household?

fields.name: Surname
fields.hint: What is the head of the household's surname?

fields.name: First Name
fields.hint: Head of household's first name

fields.name: Other Name
fields.hint: Head of household's other name

fields.name: Gender
fields.hint: Head of household's gender

fields.name: Citizenship
fields.hint: Of which country is the head of the household a citizen?

fields.name: Age
fields.hint: Head of household's age

fields.name: SA ID Number
fields.hint: Enter the SA ID number of the head of the household

fields.name: Years Local
fields.hint: How many years has the head of  the household lived in the area?

fields.name: Dependents
fields.hint: How many dependants does the head of household have?

fields.name: Occupation
fields.hint: what is the occupation of the head of household?

fields.name: Formally Employed
fields.hint: Is the head of household formally employed, ie UIF number?

fields.name: Full Time Employed
fields.hint: Is the employment full time?

fields.name: Subsidy Recipient
fields.hint: Has the head of household ever applied for or received a housing or land reform subsidy?

fields.name: Specify Subsidy
fields.hint: Please specify details of the housing or land reform subsidy.

fields.name: Title Deed
fields.hint: Does the head of household have a title deed to any property?

fields.name: Title Deed Details
fields.hint: Please specify details of the title deed and propperty

fields.name: Household Income
fields.hint: What is the total monthly income of the household? Mix incomes are permissible.

fields.name: Income Sources
fields.hint: Specify all sources of income for the household.

fields.name: Other Income Sources
fields.hint: Please specify other sources of household income.

fields.name: Saving
fields.hint: Is your household saving money?

fields.name: Monthly Saving
fields.hint: How much do you save per month?

fields.name: Saving Methods
fields.hint: How does the household save?

fields.name: Savings Usage
fields.hint: What do you use the savings for?

fields.name: Household Members
fields.hint: How many members in the household excluding tennats?

fields.name: School Kids
fields.hint: How many children attend school?

fields.name: School Distance
fields.hint: How far is the school?

fields.name: Preschool Kids
fields.hint: How many children are of pre-school age (below 7)

fields.name: Creche Attendants
fields.hint: How many children attend creche?

fields.name: Creche Distance
fields.hint: How far is the creche?

fields.name: Special Needs Household
fields.hint: Is there anyone in your household with special needs?

fields.name: Disabled Household Members
fields.hint: Are any members of your household disabled?

fields.name: Disabled Number
fields.hint: How many members of your household are disabled?

fields.name: Diseased Household Members
fields.hint: Do any members of your household suffer from chronic disease?

fields.name: Diseased Number
fields.hint: How many members of your household suffer from chronic illness?

fields.name: structures
fields.hint: How many structures on the site excluding VIP?

fields.name: Main Structure Type
fields.hint: Is the main structure/house on the site formal or informal?

fields.name: Rooms
fields.hint: How many rooms are in the main structure?

fields.name: Structure Size
fields.hint: Approximate square meters of the main structure

fields.name: Permission to Occupy
fields.hint: Do you have permission to occupy the site?

fields.name: Registered
fields.hint: Is your permission to occupy registered?

fields.name: Allocator
fields.hint: Who allocated you the land?

fields.name: Tenants
fields.hint: Do you have tenants?

fields.name: Number of Tenants
fields.hint: How many tenants are there on your site?

fields.name: Student Tenants
fields.hint: How many of your tenants are students?

fields.name: Average Rent
fields.hint: How much is the average rent per tenant?

fields.name: Tenant
fields.hint: Are you a tenant?

fields.name: Landlord
fields.hint: Who is your landlord

fields.name: Electricity
fields.hint: Are you connected to the electricity?

fields.name: Sanitation
fields.hint: What sanitation do you have access to?

fields.name: Road Access
fields.hint: Is there road access to the house?

fields.name: Footpath Access
fields.hint: Is there formal footpath access to the house?

fields.name: Ambulance
fields.hint: Do you have access to Ambulance Services?

fields.name: Ambulance Rating
fields.hint: Please rate the quality of the ambulance service.

fields.name: Fire Service
fields.default: Do you have access to fire services?

fields.hint: Please rate the quality of the fire services.

fields.name: Police
fields.hint: Do you have access to police services?

fields.hint: Please rate the quality of the police service

fields.name: Service Problem 1
fields.hint: What is your biggest service problem?

fields.hint: What is your second biggest service problem?

fields.name: Service Problem 3
fields.hint: What is your third biggest service problem?

fields.name: Willing to Move
fields.hint: If your site is in a risk area, will you be willing to move to an alternative site?

fields.name: Move or Stay
fields.hint: Would you prefer to be developed where you are or to move to a new area?

fields.name: Business on Site
fields.hint: Is there business conducted at your site?

fields.name: Only Income
fields.hint: Is your business your only source of income?

fields.name: Business Required
fields.hint: As a consumer, what type of business are most urgently required in your area?

fields.name: Services Access
fields.hint: Do you have access to community services eg police, sports fields, etc?

fields.hint: Please rate the accessibility of health care facilities in your area.

fields.hint: Please rate the accessibility and adequacy of the Post Office in your area

fields.hint: Please rate the accessibility and adequacy of the Sports Fields in your area

fields.hint: Please rate the accessibility and adequacy of the Police Station in your area

fields.hint: Please rate the accessibility and adequacy of the Community Hall in your area

fields.hint: On which days is the center operational?

fields.hint: How many hours a day is the center operational for?

fields.hint: Who owns the ECD Centre?

fields.hint: When was the center established?

fields.hint: Is the facility  registered as an NPO?

fields.name: NPO Number
fields.hint: What is the NPO Number?

fields.hint: Is the ECD Centre registered with the DSD: Tick one:  unregistered,  in  process,  conditional registration, full registration? (evidenced by Form 12)

fields.name: Conditional Reasons
fields.hint: Indicate what was found to be inadequate: Indicate one or more:

fields.name: DSD Funded
fields.hint: Does the DSD fund this ECD  project?

fields.name: Number of Subsidies
fields.hint: If so , how many children recieves subsidies? Add number

fields.name: Governance Comittee
fields.hint: Is there a Committee for the facility ?

fields.name: Minutes Availlable
fields.hint: If so ,are there minutes available?

fields.name: Comittee Work Training Received
fields.hint: Have members of the management committee received "committee work" training ?

fields.name: Number of Meetings
fields.hint: How many times in the last year did the staff and a group of parents meet to discuss the crèche?

fields.name: Parents Consulted
fields.hint: Are parents’ views taken into account when changes are made to the crèche?

fields.name: Committee Members Numbers
fields.hint: Number of members on the Management Committee ?

fields.name: Committee Meeting Frequency
fields.hint: How often does the Management Committee meet ?

fields.name: NPO has Constitution
fields.hint: Does the NPO have a constitition ?

fields.name: Parental Activities
fields.hint: What kind of activities are parents involved in - tick one or more

fields.hint: Does the centre keep proper books  (e.g. record of income & expenses, assets and liabilities)

fields.name: Financials In Place
fields.hint: Are there documented annual financial statements in place?

fields.hint: Do you wish to eventually improve your centre over time and formally register it with the DSD?

fields.hint: Is the staff willing to undergo ECD practitioner and other training or mentorship to improve capacity?

fields.hint: Is the management Committee willing to undergo training to improve their knowledge and skills

fields.hint: With which department / entity does the ECD Centre have  contact ? Tick one or more

fields.hint: Have you attended any skills training

fields.hint: Number of ECD practitioners / playgroup/ ECD Hub / Toy library facilitators

fields.hint: Number of ECD practitioners / playgroup facilitators  who have received formal ECD training

fields.hint: Does the ECD Centre / Playgroup keep Enrolment  / adminssion forms for their children?

fields.hint: Does the ECD Centre / Playgroup keep Job descriptions for staff

fields.hint: Does the ECD center /playgroup keep a staff attendance register?

fields.hint: Does the ECD center /playgroup keep a child attendance register?

fields.hint: Does the ECD center / Playgroup keep a visitors book?

fields.hint: Does the ECD center / playgroup keep a medication register for children?

fields.hint: Does the ECD center / playgroup keep a receipt book?

fields.hint: Does the ECD  center / playgroup keep a fees register?

fields.hint: Does the ECD center / playgroup keep a petty cash book?

fields.hint: Does the ECD center / playgroup keep child progress reports?

fields.hint: Does the ECD center / playgroup keep a road to health register?

fields.name: Project Policies
fields.hint: Does the ECD project have policies for : Tick all applicable

fields.name: Report Outside Abuse
fields.hint: Does thefacility  report child abuse that happens outside the centre ?

fields.name: Babies Monthly Fee
fields.hint: Fees for babies 0-2yrs per month

fields.name: Todlers Monthly Fee
fields.hint: Fees for children 3-5yrs

fields.name: Children Monthly Fees
fields.hint: Children Monthly Fees

fields.name: Obvious Safety Threats
fields.hint: Are there any obvious health and safety threats: tick one or more
choices: exposure to shebeen/ or other drug abuses

fields.name: Absence due to safety concerns
fields.hint: Are their children that you know of that are not attending  your crèche because of possible conflict in the area or the area not being safe?

fields.name: Parents Feel Safe
fields.hint: Do parents and children feel safe moving from their homes to the centre and back?

fields.name: Harmfull Substances Stored Safe
fields.hint: Are medicines , detergents and harmful substances stored in lockable  cupboard, and kept out of reach of children:

fields.name: Nurse Visits
fields.hint: Do the nurses  or Philamntwana care givers  visit the ECD Centreto weigh, deworm the children

fields.name: Monitor Immunisation
fields.hint: Does the ECD centre monitor the immunisation of the children (Y/N)  (Evidenced by the copies of the Road to Health Card )

fields.name: Talk to parents about immunisation
fields.hint: Does the ECD practitioner meet parents to talk to them about the importance of immunisations

fields.name: Practice Infection Controll
fields.hint: Does the ECD practioner practice infection control e.g. ask parents to fetch their children if they have common  childhood illnesses e.g. diahorrea, measels, chicken pox(Y/N) (Evidenced by Incident book / first aid kit)

fields.name: Administer Parent's Medicine
fields.hint: Does the ECD centre give the medicine that the parents sent with?

fields.name: Keep Records of Medicine Administered
fields.hint: Does the ECD Centre keep records of medicines given to children

fields.name: First Aid Trained Staff
fields.hint: How many of the staff at the ECD centre have formal first aid training?

fields.name: First Aid Kit
fields.hint: Does the ECD centre have a First Aid kit?

fields.name: First Aid Kit stocked
fields.hint: Is the First Aid kit stocked with the approved first aid kit items

fields.name: Have emergency Plan
fields.hint: Does the ECD Centre have a n emergency plan?

fields.name: Number Of Fire Extinguishers
fields.hint: How many fire extinguishers are provided ?

fields.name: Clean Indoors
fields.hint: Is the indoor area clean and neat?

fields.name: Childrens Appearance Clean
fields.hint: Are the children's appearance clean?

fields.name: Children Appear Sick
fields.hint: Do children appear to be sick ( running noses)

fields.name: Practice Hygiene
fields.hint: Does the practitioner make an effort to ensure hygiene e.g. wipes children's noses with a tissue?

fields.name: Chidren Attending
fields.hint: How many children are current attending the facility?

fields.name: Number Of Babies
fields.hint: How many babies 0-2years

fields.name: Number Of Todlers
fields.hint: How many children 3-5years

fields.name: ECD Programme Displayed
fields.hint: Is there a daily programme on the wall ?

fields.name: Programme Registeres
fields.hint: Is the ECD Programme registered with the DSD?(evidenced by Form 17 )

fields.name: Book Corner
fields.hint: Is there a book corner?

fields.name: Educational Toys
fields.hint: Are there educational puzzles or toys (e.g. blocks, jigsaws, balls, shape sorter) for children

fields.name: Art Equipment
fields.hint: Is  there drawing/painting equipment (i.e. things to write on e.g. paper or coloring in books and to write with e.g. crayons, pencils, paints etc.)

fields.name: Childrens Work Diplayed
fields.hint: Are Children's work displayed?

fields.name: Learning Posters
fields.hint: Are there learning posters on the walls (e.g. 1,2,3; ABC etc)

fields.name: Play Mat
fields.hint: Is there a big enough play mat e.g. carpet to sit on for 'routine/together time' e.g. news time , story telling?

fields.name: Seperated Spaces
fields.hint: Are there  separate 'spaces' or playrooms assigned for children of different age groups participating in different programmes?

fields.name: Matresses
fields.hint: Is there  a mattress  for each child?

fields.name: Nutrition Breakfast
fields.hint: Who provides breakfast:

fields.name: Nutrition Lunch
fields.hint: Who provides lunch?

fields.name: Meal Plan
fields.hint: If the centre provides the food  - does the centre have an approved daily meal plan /menu  evidenced by meal plan on wall of kitchen ?

fields.name: Tennure
fields.hint: Who owns the land?

fields.name: Formal Lease
fields.hint: If rented, has a formal lease been signed?

fields.hint: What is the estimated size of the site in meters squared? (width X length)

fields.name: Space To Extend
fields.hint: Is there adequate space for an extension to the building?
